description: The heiress, 32, who is expecting her first child with husband James Rothschild, wore a navy and white striped sweater and denim shorts while out in West Hollyood on Wednesday.
title: Pregnant Nicky Hilton wears baggy sweater in Los Angeles
title_page: Pregnant Nicky Hilton wears baggy sweater in Los Angeles | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's expecting her first child with husband James Rothschild.
But Nicky Hilton Rothschild covered up any hint of a growing baby bump as she went shopping in West Hollywood on Thursday.
The 32-year-old heiress and the banking heir are expecting a baby, Nicky's aunt Kyle Richards confirmed last week.
Expecting: Pregnant Nicky Hilton was spotted shopping in West Hollywood on Thursday
On Wednesday, the sister of socialite and DJ Paris Hilton looked relaxed as she browsed stores.
She covered up any hint of a baby bump in a baggy navy and white striped sweater with blue sparkles on the neckline.
The handbag designer also hid her tummy behind one of her own stylish Linea Pelle capsule collection bags.
The structured tan bag featured a brown leather trim and cross-strap.
Nicky slung a brown shopping bag that appeared to be from Madewell over her shoulder.
Relaxed style: The heiress held one of her own handbag designs over her stomach to hide any hint of a baby bump
The mother-to-be flashed her toned legs in rolled-up denim shorts as she strolled across the street, and added black slipper-style flats.
Nicky wed her financier husband James in a lavish ceremony at Kensington Palace in London on July 10, 2015. The couple met at Formula One heiress Petra Ecclestone's wedding to James Stunt in 2011, and began dating soon after.
The hotel heiress' large diamond wedding and engagement rings were clearly visible as she indulged in some retail therapy in Los Angeles on Thursday.
Mom to be: Nicky wed banking heir husband James Rothschild in a lavish London ceremony in July
The 365 Style author wore her blonde hair down and shielded her eyes with large sunglasses.
Nicky has no doubt had a difficult week after the death of her uncle Monty Brinson, who was wed to her aunt, Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Kim Richards in the 1980s.
Monty died on Sunday at the age of 58 after a long battle with cancer.
Also this week, Nicky's troubled brother Conrad Hilton also narrowly avoided jail time for probation violations related to an epic airplane meltdown, including allegedly breaking into his ex-girlfriend's home. He was ordered into residential rehab for at least 90 days instead of a maximum six months in prison.
